Headline: Blue Line Trains bypassing Division Station
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at Division due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at Division due to police activity.

At this time, consider other alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

  • Shuttle buses have been requested from Logan Square to Grand to provide connecting service in both directions.
  • Nearby bus route #56 Milwaukee is also available to provide connecting service.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
